title: How should violence be used and described in a story? - Quora

response.answer_text: However it fits your story, but you should also be open about it with the reader. Horror? Do your worst. If it fits your plot, don’t shy away from gore, torture or whatever. Cozy mystery? Sure, you’ll have a murder there, but you’ve promised your reader that you’ll keep the description to a minimum, and gloss over the most disgusting details. The readers don’t want that to be solved by analyzing the maggots in the wounds. You know what you’re aiming for. Some people will complain anyway. Just keep your promises.
